name: The Bogeymen
description:
Remember the monsters in your closet?

Now imagine all those things you feared were going to get you as a child were real - or at least one of them was, while you were imagining the rest. The Bogeymen puts you in the shoes of your childhood self, fighting off various monsters with a twist: one of them is real, while the rest you are imagining in your state of sleep deprivation. How do you fight against them? Light. These monsters hate light, and you're equipped with a flashlight. Hold them off until 5am and the sun will banish them for good - or at least until the next night.

Developed as part of the 2022.1 Brackeys Game Jam. Code and concept by me (Discord @Black Mesa Employee#0001), 3D modelling by Dash Matrix (Discord @Ahmed Malik#7096, https://dash-matrix.itch.io/)
